fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Lamplamplamplamplamplamp (Day): Attach yourself to a lamp and receive all notifications that your target receives for the rest of the day and tonight.
-Darklampbutstilllamplamplamplamp (Night): Learn the next 10 messages sent in private chats (such as factional chats, or messages between a jailor/wisteria and their target, etc). You will not know who sent them or where they came from, but the content is not censored. 1 use.
